ENG: This is the default DRS description message
FR: None

ENG: [BOOLEAN] Whether to add outputs to calibration database
FR: [BOOLEAN] S'il faut ajouter des sorties à la base de données d'étalonnage

ENG: Lists ALL the night name directories in the input directory if used without a 'directory' argument or lists the files in the given 'directory' (if defined)
FR: Répertorie TOUS les répertoires de noms de nuit du répertoire d'entrée s'il est utilisé sans l'argument 'directory' ou répertorie les fichiers du 'répertoire' donné (si défini)

ENG: Activates debug mode (Advanced mode [INTEGER] value must be an integer greater than 0, setting the debug level)
FR: Active le mode débogage (la valeur en mode avancé [INTEGER] doit être un entier supérieur à 0, définissant le niveau de débogage)

ENG: [STRING] The 'night_name' or absolute path of the directory
FR: [STRING] Le 'night_name' ou chemin absolu du répertoire

ENG: [STRING] A single fits files.
FR: [STRING] Un seul correspond à des fichiers.

ENG: [STRING/STRINGS] A list of fits files to use separated by spaces.
FR: [STRING / STRINGS] Liste des fichiers de correspondance à utiliser séparés par des espaces.

ENG: Displays the short version of the help menu
FR: Affiche la version courte du menu d'aide

ENG: [BOOLEAN] Whether to run in interactive mode – 0 to be in non-interactive mode

COMMENT: Here the limit is the number of files/directorys shown
ENG: Lists the night name directories in the input directory if used without a 'directory' argument or lists the files in the given 'directory' (if defined). Only lists up to {0} files/directories
FR: Répertorie les répertoires de noms de nuit dans le répertoire d'entrée s'ils sont utilisés sans l'argument 'directory' ou répertorie les fichiers du 'répertoire' donné (si défini). Ne répertorie que jusqu'à {0} fichiers / répertoires

ENG: [INTEGER] Plot level. 0 = off, 1 = interactively, 2 = save to file
FR: [BOOLEAN] Niveau de graphique. 0 = désactivé, 1 = interactivement, 2 = enregistrer dans un fichier

ENG: Test recipe - used to test the argument parser of the DRS
FR: Test recipe - utilisé pour tester l'analyseur d'arguments du DRS

ENG:
test.py [NIGHT_NAME] [DARK_DARK] [FLAT_FLAT] 
 test.py 2018-08-05 2295520f_pp.fits dark_dark_P5_003d_pp.fits 
 test.py 2018-08-05 2295520f_pp dark_dark_P5_003d_pp.fits 
 test.py 2018-08-05 *f_pp *d_pp
FR:
test.py [NIGHT_NAME] [DARK_DARK] [FLAT_FLAT] 
 test.py 2018-08-05 2295520f_pp.fits dark_dark_P5_003d_pp.fits 
 test.py 2018-08-05 2295520f_pp dark_dark_P5_003d_pp.fits 
 test.py 2018-08-05 *f_pp *d_pp

ENG: Currently allowed types: -DARK_DARK -FLAT_FLAT
FR: Types actuellement autorisés: -DARK_DARK -FLAT_FLAT

ENG: Currently allowed types: -FP_FP
FR: Types actuellement autorisés: -FP_FP

ENG: Displays the current version of this recipe.
FR: Affiche la version actuelle de cette recette.

ENG: and
FR: et

ENG: Description:
FR: La description:

ENG: Example uses:
FR: Exemple d'utilisation:

ENG: no
FR: non

ENG: options
FR: les options

ENG: or
FR: ou

ENG: positional arguments
FR: arguments de position

ENG: Usage:
FR: L'utilisation:

ENG: yes
FR: oui

ENG: [BOOLEAN] If True previews the changelog before making any changes if False makes changes without preview
Produces a nicely formatted change log (using git). Requires gitchangelog to be installed via 'pip install gitchangelog'
This is the top level test recipe
Resets the DRS raw/tmp/db/reduced files based on user input
[STRING] The instrument to reset
[BOOLEAN] If True logs the reset else is quite
[BOOLEAN] If True asks for user to type 'YES' before each reset
Reprocess a night or all nights given some options
[STRING] The run file to use in reprocessing
[STRING] The 'night_name' or directory to reprocess (default is None for all directories)
[STRING] The 'filename' to reprocess (default is None for all files)
[STRING] The instrument to reprocess
[BOOLEAN] If True skips preprocessed files that are already found
[INTEGER] the mode to calculate the hc wave solution. 0 = Etienne method
[INTEGER] the mode to calculate the fp+hc wave solution. 0 = following Bauer et al 15 (previously WAVE_E2DS_EA), 1 = following C Lovis (previously WAVE_NEW)
[STRING] The name of the program to display and use (mostly for logging purpose) log becomes date | {THIS STRING} | Message
[BOOLEAN] If True always returns to ipython (or python) at end (via ipdb or pdb)
